content: round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 1 make 2 single_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts *round 3 will have 8 drips drip 1 chain 7 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 4 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 sts 8 sts drip 2 chain 5 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into the next st 5 sts drip 3 chain 7 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 4 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 sts 8 sts drip 4 chain 5 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into the next st 5 sts drip 5 chain 7 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 4 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 sts 8 sts drip 6 chain 5 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into the next st 5 sts drip 7 chain 7 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 4 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 sts 8 sts drip 8 chain 5 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into the next st 5 sts fasten_off sew the center down sew the drips down link to video https //youtu be/gusllucplvq if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
